info.name: Challenge Alkemy
info.description:
In order to execute all the endponts related with movies, characters, character vs movies and genres you must to get a token.

How to get a token?

You should register a user and thend login in order to get a token key. Once you get this token, you must include it in the header, in the authorization section.

response.name: Invalid Login
Bad request Login
Invalid Register - DB user already exists
response.body:
{
    "success": false,
    "error": {
        "name": "SequelizeUniqueConstraintError",
        "errors": [
            {
                "message": "user must be unique",
                "type": "unique violation",
                "path": "user",
                "value": "jaimegmail.com",
                "origin": "DB",
                "instance": {
                    "id": null,
                    "nickname": "jaime",
                    "user": "jaimegmail.com",
                    "password": "1234",
                    "updatedAt": "2022-03-23T02:51:04.147Z",
                    "createdAt": "2022-03-23T02:51:04.147Z"
                },
                "validatorKey": "not_unique",
                "validatorName": null,
                "validatorArgs": []
            }
        ],
        "parent": {
            "code": "ER_DUP_ENTRY",
            "errno": 1062,
            "sqlState": "23000",
            "sqlMessage": "Duplicate entry 'jaimegmail.com' for key 'users.user'",
            "sql": "INSERT INTO `Users` (`id`,`nickname`,`user`,`password`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?,?);",
            "parameters": [
                "jaime",
                "jaimegmail.com",
                "1234",
                "2022-03-23 02:51:04",
                "2022-03-23 02:51:04"
            ]
        },
        "original": {
            "code": "ER_DUP_ENTRY",
            "errno": 1062,
            "sqlState": "23000",
            "sqlMessage": "Duplicate entry 'jaimegmail.com' for key 'users.user'",
            "sql": "INSERT INTO `Users` (`id`,`nickname`,`user`,`password`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?,?);",
            "parameters": [
                "jaime",
                "jaimegmail.com",
                "1234",
                "2022-03-23 02:51:04",
                "2022-03-23 02:51:04"
            ]
        },
        "fields": {
            "user": "jaimegmail.com"
        },
        "sql": "INSERT INTO `Users` (`id`,`nickname`,`user`,`password`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?,?);"
    }
}

response.name: Invalid Register - DB Validation
response.body:
{
    "success": false,
    "error": {
        "name": "SequelizeDatabaseError",
        "parent": {
            "code": "ER_NO_DEFAULT_FOR_FIELD",
            "errno": 1364,
            "sqlState": "HY000",
            "sqlMessage": "Field 'password' doesn't have a default value",
            "sql": "INSERT INTO `Users` (`id`,`nickname`,`user`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?);",
            "parameters": [
                "jaime",
                "jaimegmail.com",
                "2022-03-23 02:54:59",
                "2022-03-23 02:54:59"
            ]
        },
        "original": {
            "code": "ER_NO_DEFAULT_FOR_FIELD",
            "errno": 1364,
            "sqlState": "HY000",
            "sqlMessage": "Field 'password' doesn't have a default value",
            "sql": "INSERT INTO `Users` (`id`,`nickname`,`user`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?);",
            "parameters": [
                "jaime",
                "jaimegmail.com",
                "2022-03-23 02:54:59",
                "2022-03-23 02:54:59"
            ]
        },
        "sql": "INSERT INTO `Users` (`id`,`nickname`,`user`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?);",
        "parameters": [
            "jaime",
            "jaimegmail.com",
            "2022-03-23 02:54:59",
            "2022-03-23 02:54:59"
        ]
    }
}

response.name: characters create - character already exists
response.body:
{
    "success": false,
    "status_code": 500,
    "message": {
        "name": "SequelizeUniqueConstraintError",
        "errors": [
            {
                "message": "name must be unique",
                "type": "unique violation",
                "path": "name",
                "value": "Uma Thurman",
                "origin": "DB",
                "instance": {
                    "id": null,
                    "image": "default.png",
                    "name": "Uma Thurman",
                    "age": 51,
                    "weight": 65,
                    "history": "still working on it",
                    "createdAt": "2022-04-03T23:32:01.097Z",
                    "updatedAt": "2022-04-03T23:32:01.097Z"
                },
                "validatorKey": "not_unique",
                "validatorName": null,
                "validatorArgs": []
            }
        ],
        "parent": {
            "code": "ER_DUP_ENTRY",
            "errno": 1062,
            "sqlState": "23000",
            "sqlMessage": "Duplicate entry 'Uma Thurman' for key 'characters.name'",
            "sql": "INSERT INTO `Characters` (`id`,`image`,`name`,`age`,`weight`,`history`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);",
            "parameters": [
                "default.png",
                "Uma Thurman",
                51,
                65,
                "still working on it",
                "2022-04-03 23:32:01",
                "2022-04-03 23:32:01"
            ]
        },
        "original": {
            "code": "ER_DUP_ENTRY",
            "errno": 1062,
            "sqlState": "23000",
            "sqlMessage": "Duplicate entry 'Uma Thurman' for key 'characters.name'",
            "sql": "INSERT INTO `Characters` (`id`,`image`,`name`,`age`,`weight`,`history`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);",
            "parameters": [
                "default.png",
                "Uma Thurman",
                51,
                65,
                "still working on it",
                "2022-04-03 23:32:01",
                "2022-04-03 23:32:01"
            ]
        },
        "fields": {
            "name": "Uma Thurman"
        },
        "sql": "INSERT INTO `Characters` (`id`,`image`,`name`,`age`,`weight`,`history`,`createdAt`,`updatedAt`) VALUES (DEFAULT,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);"
    }
}
